value.text: this iconic advertising copywriter named Kathy Hepinstall Parks died over the weekend and I wanted to share something from her website I thought Bluesky would like

images.alt:
Why should I write better when a machine can do it for me?
Because actually no one can do it for you, because your voice is unique among all the people on earth. Siri never petted a horse's neck. Alexa has never been ghosted by the captain of the football team. But you have lived, your heart is beating, you have suffered, and you have something important to say. It's a human's job, to use words, and whatever job you give to a machine, that part of your brain goes dark. Maybe it's worth it when it comes to remembering phone numbers and directions, but when that part of your brain that uses words goes dark, that's a vast area that's very close to your soul. Don't let some internet platform convince you that what you have to say and create isn't worthwhile. Words are the echo of your soul. Honing that echo matters.

Nishiki Tenmangū Shrine

Nishiki Tenmangū Shrine was founded in 1003. It was originally located at the birthplace of Sugawara no Michizane—a 9th-century aristocrat who posthumously became a deity in the Japanese pantheon, the much-revered (and feared) god of academia known as Tenjin. It was later…

external.description: Nishiki Tenmangū Shrine was founded in 1003. It was originally located at the birthplace of Sugawara no Michizane—a 9th-century aristocrat who posthumously became a deity in the Japanese pantheon, the much-revered (and feared) god of academia known as Tenjin. It was later relocated in the 16th century to the eastern edge of Kyoto’s bustling Nishiki Market, earning its prefix. The shrine is notable for its ill-positioned torii arch. At first, it merely served as the shrineÆs entrance. Then, when the street was constructed, the upper edges of the arch had to be incorporated into the surrounding buildings, because the arch was sacred and couldn't be altered.
external.title: Nishiki Tenmangū Shrine

When we say AI is wrong is because we're starting to fail mapping the internal procedure.
Which is precisely what happens between fake and real AI: the black box of blindness.

epistemologically:
neither computer calculators, nor human beings can be wrong. Laws of physics aren't wrong, and the only valid ontology of "wrongness" is solely representation.
Things within the brain still follow cause and effect. Mapping these accurately is complex and hard.
But not wrong.

This is epistemologically wrong.
Human beings are calculators that are often wrong. And that, TOO, is incorrect.
But once again, it's not that AI is not as smart as we think: HUMAN BEINGS ARE NOT AS SMART AS THEY (we) THINK.

Butterfly Network Joins Research Project Studying the Impact of AI-Assisted POCUS on Early Tuberculosis Detection in Sub-Saharan Africa

A new artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm will be trialed, designed to give frontline healthcare workers assistance in using Butterfly ultrasound probes to…

external.description: A new artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm will be trialed, designed to give frontline healthcare workers assistance in using Butterfly ultrasound probes to detect deadly lung disease. The initial trial opens in September for patients in Sub-Saharan Africa. BURLINGTON, Mass. & NEW YORK - Butterfly Network, Inc. (“Butterfly”, “the Company”) (NYSE: BFLY), a digital health company transforming care with handheld, whole-body ultrasound, today announced its role in the international research study CAD LUS4TB that will evaluate the impact of AI-assisted point-of-care ultrasound (POCUS) on tuberculosis (TB) triage in under-resourced settings.

record.text:
西ハム対チェルシー今夜の注目チーム編成と戦況分析 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: ウェストハムの監督グレアム・ポッターは、今晩の旧クラブ対戦に向けてメディアに対し、敗戦の反省とチームの改善点について語った。彼は、アウェイのパフォーマンスは及第点だったが、結果として痛い敗北を喫したことを認め、勝つことへのプレッシャーと難しさを率直に述べた。試合前の外のレストランでは、ロンドン風の揚げ豚肉のパスタや家庭的なイギリス料理も提供されており、観戦前の食事も楽しめる。試合はウェストハムが一人交代で闘い、ソウチェクが復帰。一方、チェルシーも3人交代で臨んでいる。試合のデータによると、ウェストハムのスターティングメンバーにはホルマセンやソウチェク、パケタなどが名を連ね、ギデンズやジェームスは控えに回っている。チェルシーはサンチェスやアダラビオイなどを先発に起用。試合主審はマイケル・オリバー。
external.title: 西ハム対チェルシー今夜の注目チーム編成と戦況分析 - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text:
ウェストハムとチェルシー激突今季2週目の見どころ - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: 2025-26プレミアリーグの第2週はロンドンスタジアムでウエストハム対チェルシーの試合から始まる。ウエストハムは開幕戦で昇格したサンダーランドに0-3で敗れ、厳しい結果となったが、監督のグラハム・ポッターは選手達を信じ、チームとして改善に努める姿勢を示した。彼は「良い結果が出せなかったが、外部の救いを期待せず、チーム一丸となって責任を取りながら成長することが重要」と述べ、厳しい結果を受け止めて次に向かう必要性を強調した。チェルシーは開幕戦でクリスタルパレスと0-0の引き分けに終わったが、トシン・アダラビオは出場可能で、ジョナス・マレスカ監督はクリストファー・ンクンクとニコラス・ジャクソンが離脱中でタイトル争いに向けて整備を進めている。昨季はチェルシーがロンドンスタジアムで3-0勝利を収めたが、ウエストハムは過去8試合のうち4勝を挙げている。試合は午後8時キックオフ。
external.title: ウェストハムとチェルシー激突今季2週目の見どころ - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text:
前田遼一コーチが2年で築くセットプレー得点力とW杯準備 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
現役引退からわずか2年で日本代表のコーチに就任し、選手時代と同じ向上心を持ち成長を続けている前田遼一コーチ（44）は、セットプレーを通じて日本の得点力向上に尽力している。  
彼は、2011年アジア杯で全6試合に先発し、日本の優勝に大きく貢献した経験を活かし、現在もコーナーキックなどのセットプレーの重要性を認識している。  
2023年1月以降は第2次森保ジャパンの一員として、得点やチャンス創出を目指し、W杯での上位進出に不可欠な得点源となるべく取り組んでいる。  
過去の経験を振り返りつつ、コーチとして選手やクラブの映像、練習現場に足を運び、アイデアや戦術を吸収し続けている。  
その結果、彼が加わった試合ではセットプレーからの得点が増加し、2026年W杯北中米最終予選では全30得点中6得点がCKを起点としたもので、着実に効果を上げている。  
あと1年を切ったW杯本番に向けて、「結果を出すために一戦一戦を大切にし、自分たちの力を積み重ねていきたい」と意気込みを示した。  
監督の「保証されていない」という言葉に刺激を受けながら、次の代表戦や遠征にも意欲を燃やし、さらなる得点やチームの成長を追求している。
external.title: 前田遼一コーチが2年で築くセットプレー得点力とW杯準備 - AIサッカーまとめ

We now have some data on the environmental impact per AI prompt: 

Gemini: 0.00024 kWh & 0.26 mL water

ChatGPT: 0.0003 kWh & 0.38 mL

...the same energy as one Google search in 2008 & 6 drops of water. Seems to be improving, too: Google reports a 33x drop in energy use per prompt in a year.

But...

record.text:
We now have some data on the environmental impact per AI prompt: 

Gemini: 0.00024 kWh & 0.26 mL water

ChatGPT: 0.0003 kWh & 0.38 mL

...the same energy as one Google search in 2008 & 6 drops of water. Seems to be improving, too: Google reports a 33x drop in energy use per prompt in a year.

But...

These numbers match independent direct measures, like 0.00004 kWh for 400 tokens on Llama 3.3 70B on a H100 node. However, they are smaller than what Mistral reported for their older model (50 mL of water and 1.14g carbon emission) per average query.

It also doesn't include one-time model training.
My bsky-site contrarian opinion is that Google’s AI Overviews are actually good because they allow for a much wider array of search inputs and usually do return good results.

record.text: Tool or approach to identify and replace obsolete .NET Framework APIs during migration to .NET 8

external.description: I'm in the process of migrating a solution containing multiple projects from .NET Framework 4.8 to .NET 8. After running the migration using the Upgrade Assistant, I encountered several issues where APIs used in the original codebase are either obsolete or no longer available in .NET 8. For instance, System.IO.DirectoryInfo.FullName is flagged as unsupported. There are many such .NET Framework level APIs which cannot be migrated, listed below here.. Is there a tool or approach that can help automatically identify and replace these obsolete .NET Framework APIs with their modern equivalents in .NET 8? Ideally, I’m looking for a solution that can work across multiple projects to streamline the migration process. Any guidance, tools, or best practices would be greatly appreciated! I tried upgrading each project in my solution using upgrade assistant tool, however most of the projects were set to .NET Standard 2.0 instead of migrating to .net8. On further analysis, it was found that as the libraries/APIs which these projects are dependent on are not supported in .NET8 or are obsolete. In order to migrate these projects to .net8, first the libraries/APIs needs to be fixed or replaced with versions which are supported by .net8.
external.title: Tool or approach to identify and replace obsolete .NET Framework APIs during migration to .NET 8

images.alt:
Festa do Peão de Barretos vai ter apresentação de dupla sertaneja criada com inteligência artificial

• Humberto Henrique e Osmar cantarão música com Lorena Cristine nos dia 22 e 29
• Canção tem como objetivo promover a hidratação e consumo responsável de bebidas alcoólicas

por Ana Clara Cotteco
21.ago.2025

A 70ª edição da Festa do Peão de Barretos terá uma atração incomum neste ano. A Ambev, parceira do evento, apresentará uma dupla sertaneja virtual desenvolvida com inteligência artificial.

Na apresentação das noites 22 e 29 de agosto, a cantora Lorena Cristine dividirá o palco com Humberto Henrique e Osmar, uma "dupla virtual" que será projetados em telões, para lançar a música "Chama no Equilíbrio". Segundo a Ambev, a canção foi criada em um processo que combinou composição humana e ferramentas de IA.

A letra da música incentiva a hidratação e o consumo responsável de bebidas alcoólicas. Entre os versos estão "Então chama na água, pra revezar com a cerveja" e "No calor do rolê, na emoção de quem ama / É água que chama, é água que chama".

Festa do Peão de Barretos se tornou o maior rodeio da América Latina, reunindo montarias, shows e milhares de visitantes no interior paulista. Este ano, o evento vai acontecer entre os dias 21 a 31 de agosto com show de artistas como Fernando e Sorocaba, Bruno e Marrone e Ana Castela.

images.alt:
Images of excerpts from a text chat on Aetna's member site:

Aetna Chat: Do you have additional questions about this claim?

Me: Why was it not covered?


Aetna Chat: Let me get you to a live representative who can help.
Aetna Chat?: You have reached a live Agent. Give us a moment to review your transcript.

LiveAgentTM: Hi. Thank you for contacting Aetna. My name is Mary, and I will be your chat support for today. How may I help you?

Me: The form I filled out was the Vision Benefits Request, and I submitted it to the address it said to of:~~Aetna Life Insurance Company~PO Box 981106~El Paso, TX 79998

LiveAgentTM: Message Copilot

Me: What does Message Copilot mean?

LiveAgentTM: Oh, it was sent wrongly, my apologies.

Me: Why are you saying my claim should be sent through Eyemed, when I have coverage through Aetna which covers vision? I filled out the form that I found in the forms page of my Aetna account for "Vision Claim Form"

LiveAgentTM responds exactly as LLMs tend to when you correct them: Thanks for pointing that out—and you're absolutely right to question it. If your vision coverage is directly through Aetna and you used the official "Vision Claim Form" from your Aetna member portal, then submitting it to the Aetna Life Insurance Company address in El Paso is exactly what you should have done. That’s the correct process for out-of-network vision claims under Aetna’s own plans.

#Software #edge #Microsoft #przeglądarki #internetowe

Origin | Interest | Match

external.description:
Raczej nikogo nie dziwi obecność płatnych funkcjonalności wykorzystujących sztuczną inteligencję. Trudno jednak przejść obojętnie obok przeglądarek internetowych ukrywających niektóre rozwiązania za bardzo wysokim paywallem. Jak się okazuje, już wkrótce do tego niechlubnego grona dołączy Edge – amerykański koncern testuje właśnie narzędzie pozwalające na podsumowanie i streszczenie naszej internetowej aktywności. Co wiemy na ten temat?

## Edge zaoferuje iście luksusowe rozwiązanie – zapłacicie?

Dopiero co byliśmy świadkami naprawdę ciekawej aktualizacji tytułowej przeglądarki. Microsoft postanowił zaoferować swoim użytkownikom **przeprojektowaną sekcję ustawień** działającą pod banderą WebUI2. Ten istotny element interfejsu jest teraz znacznie szybszy oraz mniej zagracony – szereg opcji schowano do tematycznych kategorii. Ulepszono też menedżer haseł, co dodatkowo zwiększa bezpieczeństwo i prywatność użytkowników.

  * **Firefox 142 już jest.** **Lista nowości robi ogromne wrażenie**



Jak informuje redakcja portalu Windows Latest, trwają testy funkcji noszącej nazwę **Journeys**. Brzmi to dosyć enigmatycznie, ale już wyjaśniam o co chodzi. Mamy do czynienia z narzędziem niejako przekształcającym naszą aktywność przeglądania w podręczne i pomocne podsumowania. Cel jest prosty: oszczędzenie czasu traconego na przeczesywanie historii wyszukiwania. Microsoft chce jednak pobierać za to od konsumentów **20 dolarów miesięcznie** , czyli mniej więcej 70 złotych.





**Microsoft Edge (Windows) – pobierz przeglądarkę z naszej bazy danych**

Nadchodzące rozwiązanie jest częścią trybu **Copilot Mode** zamieniającego usługę w asystenta automatyzującego wiele nużących i powtarzalnych procesów. Na poniższym zrzucie ekranu możecie zobaczyć, że opisywana funkcja **zostanie finalnie włączona do subskrypcji Copilot Pro** kosztującej w naszym kraju 98 zł miesięcznie. Całe szczęście, ponieważ dzięki temu konsumenci zyskają przy okazji dostęp do szeregu innych intrygujących narzędzi wewnątrz poszczególnych programów (Paint, Notatnik, Word, PowerPoint i nie tylko).

Źródło zdjęcia: Windows Latest

Raczej nikt nie pokusiłby się o wydanie tylu pieniędzy na pojedynczą funkcję.

## Microsoft robi wszystko, by zachęcić ludzi do płacenia za AI

Nie można jeszcze aktywować i korzystać z Journeys, więc musimy posiłkować się teorią. Amerykański gigant twierdzi, że rozwiązanie wykorzystuje **mały model Phi-4** do analizowania aktywności użytkownika w celu generowania pomocnych podsumowań. Ma to okazać się przydatne podczas pracy nad złożonym projektem czy powrotu do porzuconych zadań. Pojawia się też wzmianka o wyświetlaniu rekomendacji, lecz trudno obecnie stwierdzić jak miałoby to działać. Koncern wspomina przy okazji o przechowywaniu danych wyłącznie lokalnie i niewykorzystywaniu ich do trenowania sztucznej inteligencji.

Funkcjonalność występowałaby w obrębie nowej karty – tam też konsumenci widzieliby **specjalne kafelki zawierające propozycje wykonania konkretnych akcji**. Mowa chociażby o zgarnięciu informacji z kilku tematycznych stron internetowych i wygenerowania podsumowania lub porad dotyczących wykonania dalszych kroków. Brzmi to naprawdę ciekawie, choć osobiście podchodzę do takich zapowiedzi z odpowiednim dystansem. Mnóstwo funkcji AI wygląda dobrze wyłącznie na papierze.

  * **Płatne przeglądarki stają się standardem.** **Planujesz z nich skorzystać?**



Teraz pozostaje czekać na powszechne wdrożenie Journeys – obecnie niewiele bowiem na temat nowości wiadomo.

Źródło: Windows Latest / Zdjęcie otwierające: materiał własny

Tour bus rolls over after crash on upstate New York highway in “potential mass casualty incident”

A tour bus rolled over after a crash on a major highway in northern New York Friday, photos from the scene showed. The collision closed all lanes on the New York State Thruway near Pembroke, around 30…

external.description: A tour bus rolled over after a crash on a major highway in northern New York Friday, photos from the scene showed. The collision closed all lanes on the New York State Thruway near Pembroke, around 30 miles northeast of Buffalo and 40 miles southeast of Niagara Falls, New York State Police said.  "Avoid the NYS Thruway eastbound at all costs as a tour bus has rolled over near the Erie and Genesee County lines," Erie County executive Mark Poloncarz said on X. "This is a potential mass casualty incident," he said, adding that the county's emergency and security services are assisting.
external.title: Tour bus rolls over after crash on upstate New York highway in “potential mass casualty incident”

record.text: What gets me most is how much I hear that rhetoric spreading from people still on there. It's warping its users, and then those users are effectively being used to pull many others into their orbit.

As someone who has stopped using Twitter ~3 years ago, after having been on it daily for the prior 16 years, it is *so* clear how much the current hateful and extreme state of the platform warps the views of its users, and NOBODY TALKS ABOUT IT. I see the effect so much working in tech.

When NOT to use the COPILOT function
COPILOT uses Al and can give incorrect responses.
To ensure reliability and to use it responsibly, avoid using COPILOT for:
Numerical calculations: Use native Excel formulas (e.g., SUM, AVERAGE, IF) for any task requiring accuracy or reproducibility.
Tasks with legal, regulatory or compliance implications: Avoid using Al-generated outputs for financial reporting, legal documents, or other high-stakes scenarios.

record.text: Ultimately, the Mavericks project and its discussion underscore a powerful sentiment: the enduring value of personal preference and the right to customize one's computing experience, even if it means navigating security trade-offs. #TechCulture 6/6

The discussion highlights a tension: modern security often means less user agency. People want to fully own their machines, making choices about their OS environment rather than being dictated by vendor updates or restrictions. #TechEthics 5/6

The appeal of legacy systems often comes down to user control. Modern OS's increasing "lockdown" clashes with the desire to modify system files, remove bloatware, and truly tailor the OS to personal needs. #UserFreedom 4/6
